Detailed Description

This class is a cache of all the waypoint sets in a chunk.

bool ChunkNavigator::find ( const WorldSpaceVector3 &  wpoint,
float  girth,
NavigatorFindResult &  res,
bool  ignoreHeight = false 
) const

Find the waypoint and its set closest to the given point of matching girth.

Parameters:
point The point to test.
girth The girth to search with.
res The result of the find.
ignoreHeight If true then the search is done only in the x-z directions.
Returns:
True if the search was successful, false otherwise.

bool ChunkNavigator::hasNavPolySet ( float  girth  )  const

This returns true if our chunk has any sets of the given girth.

Returns:
True if the chunk was any waypoint sets of the given girth, false otherwise.
